Title: 🔁🎬🖼 🇦🇫 *GRAPHIC* More footage of the Taliban parading hung m...
Description: Forwarded From Our Wars, Today🇦🇫 *GRAPHIC* More footage of the Taliban parading hung men around Herat. It appears at least three were hung this way from small construction cranes.

Title: 🔁🎬🖼 🇦🇫 *VERY GRAPHIC* In the central square of Herat, the Ta...
Description: Forwarded From Our Wars, Today🇦🇫 *VERY GRAPHIC* In the central square of Herat, the Taliban publicly hanged a kidnapper today. Apparently, he was tortured before his execution.‌‌

Title: 🔁🖼 🇦🇫 📢 #BREAKING Ahmad Massoud, leader of the Northern Alli...
Description: Forwarded From Our Wars, Today🇦🇫 📢 #BREAKING Ahmad Massoud, leader of the Northern Alliance and son of the former leader has fled to Tajikistan. The son of Afghanistan’s most celebrated anti-TB/IEA resistance leader has escaped into neighboring Tajikistan, less than a month after vowing to defend his homeland -no matter what happens.-Ahmad Massoud, son of the late Northern Alliance leader Ahmad Shah Massoud, fled to Tajikistan shortly after the TB/IEA seized control of the Panjshir Valley on September 6, according to a senior U.S. intelligence official, a Pentagon consultant, and two former senior Afghan government officials. Massoud was joined a few days later by Amrullah Saleh, the former Afghan vice president and longtime intelligence chief, who left Afghanistan by helicopter, the senior U.S. official and two former Afghan officials said.

Title: 🔁🎬 #BREAKING Footage of allegedly $6.5 Million U.S dollars foun...
Description: Forwarded From Our Wars, Today#BREAKING Footage of allegedly $6.5 Million U.S dollars found by TB/IEA forces during a search of the home of former Afghan Vice President Amrullah Saleh. Saleh recently fled from Panjshir Valley to Tajikistan after traveling to Panjshir and participating in the organization of the Northern Alliance of Northern Resistance Forces. @ourwarstoday
